thread.title: Pole To Win International - Exclusive T-shirt Sponsor for the 2015 External Development Summit (XDS)
thread.title_full: Pole To Win International - Exclusive T-shirt Sponsor for the 2015 External Development Summit (XDS)

author: Regina Walton
title: Pole To Win International - Exclusive T-shirt Sponsor for the 2015 External Development Summit (XDS)
text:
Pole To Win International is the t-shirt sponsor for the 2015 External Development Summit (XDS) , which started yesterday September 9, 2015 and goes until September 11. XDS is happening in Vancouver at the Westin Bayshore located at 1601 Bayshore Dr., Vancouver, BC V6G 2V4. The External Development Summit (XDS) is the first and only annual, international games industry event held in Canada, with a primary focus on external development for art, animation, audio, and software engineering. The program is determined by the XDS Advisory Committee and is targeted at industry professionals involved in external development (outsourcing), including: developers and publishers, service providers (vendors), technology providers, and trade organizations representing over 26 countries.
Becky Walker, PTW's Senior Vice President, Sales and Marketing, says “We’re excited to attend and sponsor XDS this year; it’s a good opportunity for us to connect and interact with like minded people who are focused on quality service and delivery.”
About PTW
PTW is the world's premier video game and e-commerce services provider with 4000+ team members across 24 studios worldwide, including Side UK Limited, award-winning creative services company. Our range of services includes: quality engineering, localization, testing, and customer support along with voice production, performance capture services, and script writing services. PTW is a one-stop shop for your production needs. We offer two decades of experience and a global reach stretching across 3 Continents. We have the infrastructure to support projects and companies of all sizes.
PTW International Group is a group of subsidiaries of Poletowin Pitcrew Holdings Inc. POLE TO WIN is a registered trademark of Pole To Win Co., Ltd in Japan and other countries. All rights reserved. For more information, visit http://www.poletowininternational.com . Stay connected with PTW International on Facebook , Twitter , and LinkedIn .
